<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 441, 718, 456]]<|/det|>
Write your Centre number, candidate number and name on all the work you hand in.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 457, 320, 470]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 472, 464, 486]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 487, 598, 501]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 502, 380, 515]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 531, 254, 545]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 546, 652, 560]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 561, 380, 574]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 576, 890, 605]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 635, 606, 650]]<|/det|>
